About us Text: Hotel ANTON & LILY is one of the prestigious and low-budget hotels in Georgia. It is a place where customers can relax comfortably.A hotel that offers its guests high-level services  and creates a comfortable environment for them.
Rooms-text: ANTON & LILY hotel has several types of rooms, you can choose according tothe number and size of people.
Breakfast-Text: A breakfast tailored to your taste every morning
Garden-Text: A garden arranged for quiet, pleasant relaxation
Pool-Text: A clean and comfortable pool will meet you with us
Free-Wifi-Text: Modern and fastest Wifi in our hotel
Housekeeping-Text: A housekeeper will serve you every day in our hotel
Dining-Service-text: In our hotel you will find in-room dining service
